A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Being a huge Star Wars fan....

There is only one way to describe this movie. 

A HUGE DISAPPOINTMENT 

So many plot holes\,   new force powers that make no sense\,  actually....   There are quite a few surprises in this movie that make no sense. 

How does Disney hand my beloved Billion dollar franchise to a director that let him do whatever he wanted.   It was like a big F U to the fans\,  the story that JJ started....    We are left with a pile of heaping garbage for JJ to fix in Part 9.
